name: You've all been bad
description:
You ended up in a fairy village, but there is nothing good there. The tree sends evil snowmen at you, and in order to get out, you need to burn it.

  • Use your mouse to shoot and turn
  • Use E to pick up or drop the canister
  • Use ASWD to move
  • Shoot the canister next to the tree to set it on fire
  • The higher the flame, the faster the tree dies
  • For each snowman you get points
  • If you freeze, your health will decrease
  • In the houses you can keep warm and increase your health

Music by https://youtube.com/@AlexandrZhelanovsMusic
